description: This is a React component file for the TestGeneration page in a frontend React application. It manages UI state for test generation, preconditions handling, and communicates with backend services for generating test cases and managing precondition files. It also imports custom components and external libraries for UI and notifications.

methods.name: mockGenerate
methods.description: Provides a mock test generation result for testing or fallback when backend URL is not configured.

methods.name: generate
methods.description: Asynchronously calls the backend to generate test cases based on selected platform and framework, or uses mock data if backend URL is unavailable.

methods.name: loadPreconditions
methods.description: Loads precondition text from storage if the specified preconditions file exists.

methods.name: savePreconditions
methods.description: Saves the current preconditions text to storage under the specified filename.

methods.name: cancelPreconditions
methods.description: Cancels editing of preconditions without clearing the text.
